markdown:
Skip to main content 

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

SkilledTradesBC is pleased to provide public access to data through our Open Data initiative. Our published data is free for anyone to re-purpose under the [Open Government License](/media/2099/download).

Using information under this license indicates your acceptance of its terms. Please review the full license prior to using SkilledTradesBC’s data, which is included in the [B.C. Data Catalogue](https://catalogue.data.gov.bc.ca/organization/skilledtradesbc). Statistical data is also available through our [statistical report page](/quarterly-statistical-reports). Please note that any cells of fewer than 5 observations are masked to protect the privacy of individuals.

To see other reports available on our website, please use the following links:

  * [3-Year Strategic and Service Plans](/service-plans)

  * [Quarterly Statistical Reports](/quarterly-statistical-reports)

  * [Annual Reports](/annual-reports)

  * [Financial Reports](/financial-reports)




In addition to Open Data, you can also view SkilledTradeBC’s Freedom of Information requests. See our [_Freedom of Information Request Tracker_](/about-trades-about-skilledtradesbc-freedom-information/freedom-information-request-tracker) for more information.

Contact [Customer Service](/contact-us) or [research@skilledtradesbc.ca](mailto:research@skilledtradesbc.ca) for any questions.
